summary: Sydney funnel-web spiders for frostbite spiders. You can get red-backed jumping spider, black widow spider and brown recluse spider as Optional
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#88ff00]Check out my new survival PVP project [/color][url=https://www.armyrust.com][color=#88ff00]ARMYRUST[/color][/url]

[heading]SERIES[/heading]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3522]Real Rats[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3293]Real Bears[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2764]Real Foxes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21892][color=#9B8000]Automatic Variants Package[/color][/url]
[heading]PACK[/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9206]Real Animals[/url]

[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Sydney funnel-web spiders for frostbite spiders.
[img]http://www.ozanimals.com/image/albums/australia/Spider/Victorian-funnelweb-spider.jpg[/img]
You can get red-backed jumping spider....
[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/_s1zhuYD58FU/TZi5qLrWjtI/AAAAAAAACHc/gT1ZTSwAiuQ/0402grays643.jpg[/img]
.... and black widow spider....
[img]http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1294/939519402_2ad63fa957.jpg[/img]
.... and brown recluse spider.......

.... in Optional files. Optionals will be rarer to find ingame.

[heading]UPDATE HISTORY[/heading]
Update 1.3 : Made spider bodies very hairy, completing the no-segments objective :D
Update 1.2 : Darker, removed segmented body, fixed normal map and split downloads.
Update 1.1 : Less shiny

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
1. Unpack Main file .rar contents to Data\
2. If you wish to also have Black widow or Red-backed jumping spiders, choose one Optional file and unpack Optional file .rar contents to Data\ choosing to overwrite if prompted

[heading]OTHER MODS[/heading][b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26544/][color=#137955]Real Night Eye[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9169][color=#33ff66]Eagle Eye Perk 3x Zoom[/color][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22300/][color=#79ff69]Summer Skies[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34570/][color=#a9ec61]Summer Solstheim HD[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22287/][color=#aaaa00]Skyhighrim[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27189][color=#ff6633]Shortcuts[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2692][color=#ff3333]Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9206][color=#793533]Real Animals[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2250][color=#131313]Black and white dog[/color][/url]
[/b][i][color=666666][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2063119]More....[/url][/color][/i]
[/font]
